The UIC Department of Kinesiology and Nutrition produces leading experts in the fields of health, fitness and nutrition. Our graduates work with professional athletes, for major healthcare institutions, in fitness and wellness facilities, and for therapeutic and rehabilitation systems.  Kinesiology , the study of body movement, focuses on the human body and how it functions. Multiple career fields use kinesiology, such as physical therapy, rehabilitation science and athletic training.  Nutrition focuses on healthy eating and the dietary requirements to maintain wellness and fight disease. A vital part of the healthcare industry, nutritionists practice in areas such as health sciences, rehabilitation and counseling.  Our programs range from undergraduate to the doctoral level, preparing students for successful careers in allied health or continuing their education with advanced degrees.       Kinesiology Degrees  Kinesiologists are concerned with the relationship between a fit, strong body and quality of life. They're experts in physical activity, prevention of injury and disease, functional evaluation, cardiovascular health and ergonomic solutions that promise better health for a lifetime.   Request information       Name  Type  Description  Apply       Minor in Kinesiology   On Campus  The perfect minor if you're looking to become a health professional. Learn the foundations of anatomy and physiology and become familiar with scientific literature.   Apply      BS in Kinesiology   On Campus  A gateway to any health career. Become an expert in injury and disease prevention, functional evaluation and rehabilitation, and ergonomic solutions that promise better health.   Apply      MS in Kinesiology   On Campus  Become a master practitioner in applied exercise physiology; psychology and promotion of exercise, health and sport behavior; or motor control and biomechanics.   Apply      PhD in Kinesiology and Nutrition   On Campus  Prepare for a successful career as a researcher, educator or scientist-practitioner. Conduct basic, applied and translational research in a wide range of kinesiology and nutrition settings.   Apply            Nutrition Degrees  We are what we eat. Nutrition experts study how our bodies transform what we consume into the energy we need. They help people live healthy lives free of ailments like digestive distress or depression. Our students combine expertise in nutrition science with knowledge of behavioral science, education, food science, management and public health to improve the nutrition of individuals, groups and populations.   Request information       Name  Type  Description  Apply       Minor in Nutrition   On Campus  A great minor if you're planning a health career. Learn principles of good nutrition and how to recognize misinformation and fad diets.   Apply      BS in Nutrition   On Campus  An intensive study of biological and physical sciences applied to nutrients and human health.   Apply      MS in Nutrition   On Campus  Prepare for practice in healthcare or industry. Choose between our coordinated or traditional programs to get on track for the future you want.   Apply      PhD in Kinesiology and Nutrition   On Campus  Prepare for a successful career as a researcher, educator or scientist-practitioner. Conduct basic, applied and translational research in a wide range of kinesiology and nutrition settings.
